nodes.name: makeCall
makeCall

makeCall(address,bytes).details: This can only be called by the deployer of this contract, presumably the IdentityProxyHub after it checks the identity heuristic.

params.data: The calldata to send with the call.

makeCall(address,bytes).return: The return value of the external call.
